com.example.shoutout.db

Class UsersRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.shoutout.db.BaseFirestoreRepository
      • com.example.shoutout.db.UsersRepository

  • public class UsersRepository
extends BaseFirestoreRepository
    Repository for registering new user, updating user information, and retrieving user information.
    Since:
    April 29, 2021

    • Method Detail

      • registerNewUser

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<java.lang.Boolean> registerNewUser(java.lang.String id,
                                                                            java.lang.String username,
                                                                            java.lang.String email)
        Asynchronously register a new user into the system. This should be performed after FirebaseAuth.createUserWithEmailAndPassword(String, String) is called, and FirebaseUser.getUid() should be used as the ID argument for this method.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user to register
        username - The username of the user to register
        email - The email address of the user to register
        Returns:
        A task containing a boolean. This boolean will be true if the registration was successful, false otherwise.

                                                                        java.lang.String newUsername)
        Asynchronously update a single user's username.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user whose username should be changed
        newUsername - The new username
        Returns:
        A void task

      • updateAvatar

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<java.lang.Void> updateAvatar(java.lang.String id,
                                                                      java.lang.String newAvatarPath)
        Asynchronously update a single user's avatar. This should be retrieved from ImagesRepository.upload(Uri) or ImagesRepository.upload(File)
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user whose avatar should be changed
        newAvatarPath - The path of the new avatar, which should be used for ImagesRepository.getUri(String) or ImagesRepository.getStream(String)
        Returns:
        A void task

      • follow

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<java.lang.Boolean> follow(java.lang.String followingUserId,
                                                                   java.lang.String followedUserId)
        Asynchronously add user B to user A's list of followed users, and add user A to user B's list of followers.
        Parameters:
        followingUserId - The user that is following.
        followedUserId - The user that is being followed.
        Returns:
        A task containing a boolean. This boolean will be true if the request was successful, false otherwise.

      • unfollow

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<java.lang.Boolean> unfollow(java.lang.String unfollowingUserId,
                                                                     java.lang.String unfollowedUserId)
        Asynchronously remove user B from user A's list of followed users, and remove user A from user B's list of followers.
        Parameters:
        unfollowingUserId - The user that is requesting to unfollow someone
        unfollowedUserId - The user that is losing a follower
        Returns:

      • like

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<java.lang.Boolean> like(java.lang.String userId,
                                                                 java.lang.String postId)
        Asynchronously add a post to a user's list of liked posts.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user that is adding a new post to their list of liked posts
        postId - The post to be added to the list of liked posts
        Returns:
        A task containing a boolean. This boolean will be true if the request was successful, false otherwise.

      • unlike

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<java.lang.Boolean> unlike(java.lang.String userId,
                                                                   java.lang.String postId)
        Asynchronously remove a post from a user's list of liked posts
        Parameters:
        userId - The user that is removing a post from their list of liked posts
        postId - The post to be removed from the user's list of liked posts
        Returns:
        A task containing a boolean, which will be true if the request was successful, false otherwise.

      • isUsernameAvailable

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<java.lang.Boolean> isUsernameAvailable(java.lang.String username)
        Asynchronously determine whether or not a username is being used by another user.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to check (case insensitive)
        Returns:
        A task containing a boolean, which will be true if the username is available, false if another user is using it.

      • isEmailAvailable

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<java.lang.Boolean> isEmailAvailable(java.lang.String email)
        Asynchronously determine whether or not an email address is being used by another user.
        Parameters:
        email - The email address to check
        Returns:
        A task containing a boolean, which will be true if the email address is available, false if another user is using it.

      • get

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<User> get(java.lang.String id)
        Asynchronously fetch a single user based on their ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user to fetch
        Returns:
        A task containing a User, which will be null if either the ID doesn't correspond to any user or if something went wrong with the request.

      • getFromUsername

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<User> getFromUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Asynchronously fetch a single user based on their username.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to fetch
        Returns:
        A task containing a user, which will be null if either the username isn't being used by anyone or if something went wrong with the request.

      • getFromEmail

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<User> getFromEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Asynchronously fetch a single user based on their email address.
        Parameters:
        email - The email address of the user to fetch
        Returns:
        A task containing a user, which will be null if either the email address isn't being used by anyone or if something went wrong with the request.

      • toDbo

        private static UsersRepository.UserDbo toDbo(User user)
        Converts an instance of User to a more database-friendly database object.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to convert
        Returns:
        A converted database object

      • fromDbo

        private static User fromDbo(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot ds)
        Safely converts a single DocumentSnapshot to a single User
        Parameters:
        ds - The document snapshot to convert
        Returns:
        A convert document snapshot. Will be null if something went wrong with the conversion.

        public static UsersRepository getInstance()
        Retrieve a static, permanent, non-null instance of this repository for ease of use.
